title: Letter Hunt
description: An interactive search-and-find game where children identify and click target letters hidden among other letters to build visual discrimination and letter recognition skills.
creator: Claude AI
subject: Reading
Letter Recognition
Visual Discrimination
Early Literacy
learningObjectives: Distinguish between visually similar letters (b/d, p/q)
Build fine motor skills through targeted clicking

controls.name: newGameButton
controls.description: Start a new game with a different target letter

controls.name: speakButton
controls.description: Hear the target letter pronounced using text-to-speech

parameters.name: difficulty
parameters.description: Controls letter density and use of confusable letter pairs
parameters.hard: 30 letters, 5 targets, confusable pairs prioritized (b/d, p/q, m/n)

assumptions: Students can use mouse or touch interface
Device supports Web Audio API for sound feedback
Device supports Web Speech API for letter pronunciation
limitations: Speech synthesis voice varies by browser/device
Does not track progress across sessions
